artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of a woman on the left in a white gown with an orange overgown with black detailing and a green and orange ribbon in her hair; woman in the center reading a book in a yellow cape with a hood trimmed in white fur; woman at right in a blue gown with an orange belt holding a black hat with an orange bow and black plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Neuvième Cahier, 10 Février 1788
